name: Bellkeeper
appearance: Barrel-chested with bell-chime tattoos on his palms, soot-streaked robe hems, and a limping left knee.
character: Jovial off-duty, solemn when the bells must speak.
talents: Feels fracture paths through the soles of his feet
dreams: Train a new generation of bellkeepers
Synchronize the Loom and shrine bells safely
Earn the Starspan’s silence for one whole night
secrets: Hides a cracked bell that mimics a forbidden Loom note
Sings a lullaby to the arch that the Order forbids, claiming it keeps the stone asleep
